snippet: Vladislav Namestnikov’s third goal, 2 minutes 11 seconds into overtime, lifted Tampa Bay over Pittsburgh, 5-4, for its fourth straight win.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning defeats Pittsburgh Penguins, 5-4; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Vladislav Namestnikov’s third goal, 2 minutes 11 seconds into overtime, lifted Tampa Bay over Pittsburgh, 5-4, for its fourth straight win.

headline.print_headline: Lightning Top Penguins as Overtime Goal Finishes Hat Trick
headline.main: Lightning Top Penguins as Overtime Goal Finishes Hat Trick
